dialogue.text: Whoa... babe, where even are we? This place is giving me the shits.
It feels... quiet. Lonely. Definitely different from the rest of Dusphoros.
Oh! Um... visitors? You can... see this place?
Yo! Didn't see you there! You blend right in, kinda spooky!
Course we can see it! I'm PJ, this is OJ! Who're you?
I'm... Ghost. Welcome to Unmbra, I suppose. Not many people come here. Or... stay.
It's nice to meet you, Ghost. It's certainly a unique town.
Ghost, huh? Fitting! Hey, since we're here... wanna rap battle?!
Yeah! Best way to introduce yourself!
I... I don't usually... Okay. Just for a little while, maybe.
